aboutMe.title: About Me
description: Hello, I am a Technical Lead in Testing and Software Quality, working in the field since 2019. My focus is on automation and I have strong skills in areas such as test scenarios, test execution, functional testing, and automated testing.

I am an expert in testing tools like Playwright, Cypress, and Selenium. As a professional, I am responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive test scripts that cover all functionalities and aspects of the software. I am skilled in planning and executing functional and automated tests successfully, ensuring all test scenarios are covered.

I am highly experienced in acceptance testing, which helps me ensure that all business and client requirements are met before releasing the software to the public. As a QA Tech Lead, I am highly valued for my ability to manage complex testing projects efficiently and accurately.

education.title: Education
education.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from XYZ University.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: 5 years of experience in web development, focused on React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
